name: My Little Worms
description: A fun game about cute and resistant worms, which will certainly entertain you and give many pleasant moments. Simple arcade game with nice graphics and unusual characters.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: any
